abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Structural Adjustment Program
            Project credit will support the second phase of the
            Government's adjustment program for addressing key
            macroeconomic and sectoral issues facing the C.A.R over the
            medium term. The basic elements of the program strategy are:
            (1) promotion of agricultural-led growth based on
            comparative advantage and a progressive opening of the
            economy to market forces; (2) retrenchment of the public
            sector and stimulation of private sector initiatives; and
            (3) mobilization of sufficient financial resources to
            support the program on concessional terms and in directions
            dictated by the priorities defined in the plan. This
            strategy will be implemented through a coherent set of
            policies for macroeconomic management, agriculture, mining,
            public enterprises and through the implementation of a far
            reaching civil service reform.
